get.description: Find all certificates. Certificates: Ao final do percurso, o usuário poderá solicitar a geração do certificado de conclusão em formato PDF.

parameters.name: _limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results possible

parameters.name: _sort
parameters.description: Sort according to a specific field.

parameters.name: _start
parameters.description: Skip a specific number of entries (especially useful for pagination)
Get entries that matches exactly your input

parameters.name: _ne
parameters.description: Get records that are not equals to something

parameters.name: _lt
parameters.description: Get record that are lower than a value

parameters.name: _lte
parameters.description: Get records that are lower than or equal to a value

parameters.name: _gt
parameters.description: Get records that are greater than a value

parameters.name: _gte
parameters.description: Get records that are greater than  or equal a value

parameters.name: _contains
parameters.description: Get records that contains a value

parameters.name: _containss
parameters.description: Get records that contains (case sensitive) a value

parameters.name: _in
parameters.description: Get records that matches any value in the array of values

parameters.name: _nin
parameters.description: Get records that doesn't match any value in the array of values

200.description: deletes a single record based on the ID supplied
